verses.verse: <S%G2774><s%> Now A Summary <S%G1161><s%> Of <S%G1909><s%> The Things <S%G3588><s%> Being Spoken Of Is, <S%G3004><s%> Such <S%G5108><s%> We Have <S%G2192><s%> A High Priest, <S%G749><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> Sat Down <S%G2523><s%> On The <S%G1722><s%> Right Hand <S%G1188><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Throne <S%G2362><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Greatness <S%G3172><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heavens; <S%G3772><s%>

Of The <S%G3588><s%> Holies <S%G39><s%> Minister, <S%G3011><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Tabernacle <S%G4633><s%> <S%G3588><s%> True <S%G228><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Pitched <S%G4078><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Man. <S%G444><s%>

<S%G3956><s%> For Every <S%G1063><s%> High Priest <S%G749><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Offer <S%G4374><s%> Gifts <S%G1435><s%> Both <S%G5037><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Sacrifices <S%G2378><s%> Is Constituted; <S%G2525><s%> Whence It Is <S%G3606><s%> Necessary <S%G316><s%> To Have <S%G2192><s%> Something <S%G5100><s%> Also For <S%G2532><s%> This One <S%G5126><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> He May Offer. <S%G4374><s%>

<S%G1487><s%> If Indeed <S%G3303><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> He Were <S%G2258><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> Earth, <S%G1093><s%> Not Even <S%G3761><s%> He Be <S%G302><s%> Would <S%G2258><s%> A Priest, <S%G2409><s%> There Being <S%G5607><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Priests <S%G2409><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Offer <S%G4374><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Law <S%G3551><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Gifts, <S%G1435><s%>

Who <S%G3748><s%> The Representation <S%G5262><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Shadow <S%G4639><s%> Serve <S%G3000><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Heavenlies, <S%G2032><s%> According As <S%G2531><s%> Was Divinely Instructed <S%G5537><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> Being About <S%G3195><s%> To Construct <S%G2005><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tabernacle; <S%G4633><s%> <S%G3708><s%> For, See, <S%G1063><s%> Says He, <S%G5346><s%> Thou Make <S%G4160><s%> All Things <S%G3956><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Pattern <S%G5179><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> Was Shewn <S%G1166><s%> Thee <S%G4671><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Mountain. <S%G3735><s%>

<S%G3570><s%> But Now <S%G1161><s%> A More Excellent <S%G1313><s%> He Has Obtained <S%G5177><s%> Ministry <S%G3009><s%> By So Much As <S%G3745><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Of A Better <S%G2909><s%> He Is <S%G2076><s%> Covenant <S%G1242><s%> Mediator, <S%G3316><s%> Which <S%G3748><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> Better <S%G2909><s%> Promises <S%G1860><s%> Has Been Established. <S%G3549><s%>

<S%G1487><s%> For If <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4413><s%> That First <S%G1565><s%> One Were <S%G2258><s%> Faultless, <S%G273><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Not <S%G302><s%> For A Second <S%G1208><s%> Would Be Sought <S%G2212><s%> Place. <S%G5117><s%>

<S%G3201><s%> For Finding Fault, <S%G1063><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> He Says, <S%G3004><s%> , Lo, <S%G2400><s%> Days <S%G2250><s%> Are Coming <S%G2064><s%> Saith The <S%G3004><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> I Will Ratify <S%G4931><s%> As Reagrds <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> House <S%G3624><s%> Of Israel <S%G2474><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> As Regards <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> House <S%G3624><s%> Of Judah <S%G2448><s%> A Covenant <S%G1242><s%> New; <S%G2537><s%>

Not <S%G3756><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Covenant <S%G1242><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> I Made <S%G4160><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3962><s%> With Their Fathers, <S%G846><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> <S%G1949><s%> Of My Taking Hold Of <S%G3450><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5495><s%> Their Hand <S%G846><s%> To Lead <S%G1806><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Out Of The <S%G1537><s%> Land <S%G1093><s%> Of Egypt; <S%G125><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> They <S%G846><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Did Not Continue <S%G1696><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1242><s%> My Covenant <S%G3450><s%> And I 2504 P-1NS-C Disregarded 272 V-AAI-1S Them, 846 P-GPM Saith The 3004 V-PAI-3S Lord. 2962 N-NSM

Because <S%G3754><s%> This Is <S%G3778><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Covenant <S%G1242><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> I Will Covenant <S%G1303><s%> With <S%G3588><s%> The House <S%G3624><s%> Of Israel <S%G2474><s%> After <S%G3326><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2250><s%> Those Days, <S%G1565><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> The Lord, <S%G2962><s%> Giving <S%G1325><s%> <S%G3551><s%> My Laws <S%G3450><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1271><s%> Their Mind <S%G846><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> Hearts <S%G2588><s%> Their <S%G846><s%> I Will Inscribe <S%G1924><s%> Them; <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> I Will Be <S%G2071><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They <S%G846><s%> Shall Be <S%G2071><s%> To Me <S%G3427><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> People. <S%G2992><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Not At All <S%G3361><s%> Shall They Teach <S%G1321><s%> Each <S%G1538><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Neighbore <S%G4139><s%> His, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Each <S%G1538><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G80><s%> His Brother, <S%G846><s%> , Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Know <S%G1097><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord; <S%G2962><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Shall Know <S%G1492><s%> Me, <S%G3165><s%> From The <S%G575><s%> Little <S%G3398><s%> One Of Them <S%G846><s%> To The <S%G2193><s%> Great One <S%G3173><s%> Of Them <S%G846><s%>

Because <S%G3754><s%> Merciful <S%G2436><s%> I Will Be <S%G2071><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G93><s%> To Their Unrighteousness, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G266><s%> Their Sins <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G458><s%> , Their Lawlessness <S%G846><s%> <S%G3756><s%> In No Wise <S%G3361><s%> Will I Remember <S%G3415><s%> More. <S%G2089><s%>

In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Saying <S%G3004><s%> New, <S%G2537><s%> He Has Made Old <S%G3822><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> First; <S%G4413><s%> <S%G3588><s%> But That Which <S%G1161><s%> Grows Old <S%G3822><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Aged <S%G1095><s%> Is Near <S%G1451><s%> Disappearing. <S%G854><s%>
